description: Describes the specified export instance tasks or all of your export instance tasks.

parameters.name: Filters
parameters.description: the filters for the export tasks. (dict) --- A filter name and value pair that is used to return a more specific list of results from a describe operation. Filters can be used to match a set of resources by specific criteria, such as tags, attributes, or IDs. If you specify multiple filters, the filters are joined with an AND, and the request returns only results that match all of the specified filters. For more information, see List and filter using the CLI and API in the Amazon EC2 User Guide. Name (string) --- The name of the filter. Filter names are case-sensitive. Values (list) --- The filter values. Filter values are case-sensitive. If you specify multiple values for a filter, the values are joined with an OR, and the request returns all results that match any of the specified values. (string) ---

nested_params.name: Name
nested_params.description: The name of the filter. Filter names are case-sensitive.

nested_params.name: Values
nested_params.description: The filter values. Filter values are case-sensitive. If you specify multiple values for a filter, the values are joined with an OR, and the request returns all results that match any of the specified values.

nested_items.name: Description
nested_items.description: A description of the resource being exported.

nested_items.name: ExportTaskId
nested_items.description: The ID of the export task.

nested_items.name: ContainerFormat
nested_items.description: The container format used to combine disk images with metadata (such as OVF). If absent, only the disk image is exported.

nested_items.name: DiskImageFormat
nested_items.description: The format for the exported image.

nested_items.name: S3Bucket
nested_items.description: The Amazon S3 bucket for the destination image. The destination bucket must exist and have an access control list (ACL) attached that specifies the Region-specific canonical account ID for the Grantee. For more information about the ACL to your S3 bucket, see Prerequisites in the VM Import/Export User Guide.

nested_items.name: S3Key
nested_items.description: The encryption key for your S3 bucket.

nested_items.name: InstanceExportDetails
nested_items.description: Information about the instance to export.

nested_items.name: InstanceId
nested_items.description: The ID of the resource being exported.

nested_items.name: State
nested_items.description: The state of the export task.

nested_items.name: StatusMessage
nested_items.description: The status message related to the export task.

nested_items.name: Tags
nested_items.description: The tags for the export task.
